subject: [R] how to update R version
body:
Hello,
   
  I am new in using Linux R. Would someone tell me what the best way to update my current R 2.3.0 to R 2.5.0? I want to keep my current library packages. Do I have to erase the older version and install the newer version? In that case, I need to re-download all the packages I need. Any short way to do the update?
   
  Thanks for your help!
   
  yanqin
